text: Harry Perry (2 December 1934 â€“ 23 January 2021) was an Irish boxer. He participated in the 1956 and 1960 Summer Olympics. He was part of the national boxing teams. He also competed in the European Amateur Boxing Championships in 1955 and 1959 winning the bronze medal then. He was born in Dublin. Perry died in Dublin on 23 January 2021, aged 86. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympians for Ireland Category:Irish boxers Category:Sportspeople from Dublin
title: Harry Perry (boxer)
